title: No 'random figure' with my Urf figure
body:
I ordered the Urf and Random Figure from the store recently and when the package arrived this morning it did not contain a random figure to go along with the Urf figure. How do i go about resolving this issue? 
Because it's not that the delivered stuff is incorrect its just that its missing an item, however the missing random figure does not actually appear on the receipt as a separate item - on the receipt it just says "Urf and Random Figure"

replies.body:
Hey man,

Not sure what's happened there, send in a support ticket here - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Same thing happend to me, just got mine today and i got a braum and an urf. I paid for braum and the urf so i was meant to get a random figure with it.

Hey.
The same happened to me.
Quite annoying, I've sent a ticket to riot about it.

Hey Prism, 

How is your ticket going? I got a reply from Riot and unfortunately it makes no sense to me. 
Here is what i sent them as a ticket. 

Me:
I ordered two items from the merch store, a Lulu figure and a 'Urf and Random Figure' combo. When the package arrived it did contain the Lulu and Urf figure but it didn't actually have a random figure included. What processes can I go through to resolve the situation of being able to get my bonus random figure from the Urf package.

Riot:
It's me Hidden Ki from the Billing Team! We apologize for the confusion on your invoice, during my investigation I discovered that it was caused by an error script stored in the program we use to send order confirmations and invoices for post-checkout communication. We hope you enjoy the discounted price from your figures, but if you would like to return the items for a full refund, we are also happy to assist.

If you have any other questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us again.

I dunno if  I'm missing something but I dont know how this is meant to help me get my random figure :(
